argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fsumre.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | fsumre.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ref | |- Re : CC --> RR |
| 4 |  | #P_ax-resscn | |- RR C_ CC |
| 5 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( Re : CC --> RR /\ RR C_ CC ) -> Re : CC --> CC ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_mp2an | |- Re : CC --> CC |
| 7 |  | #P_readd | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( Re ` ( x + y ) ) = ( ( Re ` x ) + ( Re ` y ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 6, 7 | #P_fsumrelem | |- ( ph -> ( Re ` sum_ k e. A B ) = sum_ k e. A ( Re ` B ) ) |
